General.Name: COFCO Tunhe Sugar Co Ltd
General.Description: Cofco Sugar Holding CO.,LTD., engages in the sugar and tomato processing activities in China and internationally. The company's products include cane, beet, and refining sugar, as well as raw sugar, white granulated sugar, soft white sugar, brown sugar and sugar processing by-products, granulated meals, molasses, etc. It exports its products to approximately 80 countries and regions, such as the United States, Europe, Southeast Asia, Japan, South Korea, and the Middle East. The company was formerly known as Cofco Tunhe Sugar CO,. LTD. and changed its name to Cofco Sugar Holding CO.,LTD. in November 2020. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Urumqi, China. Cofco Sugar Holding CO.,LTD. is a subsidiary of COFCO Corporation.
General.Address: China Merchants Bank Building, Urumqi, China, 830000
